self.title: CDISC ADaM Hamilton Depression Rating Scale - 17 Item Clinical Classification Parameter Code Terminology

definition: A parameter code codelist for the Hamilton Depression Rating Scale - 17 Item Clinical Classification (HAMD 17) to support the calculation of total score in ADaM.
